messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] another young unschooled musician
messages.msgSnippet: They sounded great!! they looked right at home on stage! My oldest is in a band as well. ~jennifer
messages.messageBody:
They sounded great!! they looked right at home on stage! My oldest is in
a band as well.
~jennifer



Emily Troper wrote:

> (many of them adults) came to support him and his unschooled buddy
> Joe. They rehearsed just once, and when I inquired about that, they
> assured me it was plenty :) they plan to keep playing around town.

messages.subject: another young unschooled musician
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to share a quick clip of my 15 year old unschooling (well, he did have a brief stint at Summerhill School 5 years ago) son, singing at his (first
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to share a quick clip of my 15 year old unschooling
(well, he did have a brief stint at Summerhill School 5 years ago)
son, singing at his (first ever) gig the other night. His friends
(many of them adults) came to support him and his unschooled buddy
Joe. They rehearsed just once, and when I inquired about that, they
assured me it was plenty :) they plan to keep playing around town.

Here's the link:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y-4JInZvqTs

Emily

joyously unschooling
in Portland, Oregon
with dh Michael
ds Morgan (12/91)
ds Seth (8/99)
dd Sara Kate (7/01)
and ds Jacob (12/04)






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
